name: La Perlas
storyline: Survive the eerie mysteries of a remote Philippine island and uncover its dark secrets in La Perlas, a gripping survival horror game." Players will navigate the perilous barangay terrain using stealth as an option and resourcefulness to survive encounters with mysterious adversaries. The Player must survive and explore the narrative that offers a new and immersive gameplay experience with elements of Filipino culture. With tense encounters and strategic gameplay mechanics, La Perlas promises an adrenaline-fueled journey through the unknown.
summary: A survival horror set in the Philippines.
